author: IBM Technology
description:
Ready to become a certified Analyst - Security QRadar? Register now and use code IBMTechYT20 for 20% off of your exam → https://ibm.biz/Bdexev

Malware has evolved from early viruses to profit-driven ransomware and AI threats. 🛡️ Jeff Crume explores its history, modern dangers like info stealers, and the rise of AI-augmented malware. Learn how to secure your systems and adapt to the evolving world of cyber threats. 🔒

#malware #cybersecurity #aithreats
title: The Evolution of Malware: Past, Present, and the AI-Driven Future
